CustomField.description: ** Conditionally Required ** The user to be assigned as the owner of any new account or contact created when checking out as a guest in this store. Required when the store is configured to enable guest checkout.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** Conditionally Required ** The user to be assigned as the owner of any new account or contact created when checking out as a guest in this store. Required when the store is configured to enable guest checkout.
CustomField.label: New Contact/Account Owner
